title: @WAAARGHbobo is there going to be a AMA on here?
body: Why was the Ama set at a time when most people are busy at work and was only open for a ridiculously short time

replies.body: because that's when we are work.

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UiHLLm7U,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-28T23:29:56.499+0000)

Perfect answer
